content:
üëã Hello, I’m Viswanath ‚Äî a Tech Explorer with a Purpose Welcome to TechGlobetrotter ‚Äî a personal space where I document real-world, hands-on technical content shaped by years of experience across IT, cloud, and DevOps.
With over 17 years in IT and having started my journey deep in the Linux trenches, I’ve since transitioned into building and managing complex cloud-native environments. I’ve been working with AWS since 2016, and specialize in Amazon EKS, infrastructure automation, and container orchestration at scale.
üõ†Ô∏è What I Do Design & Automate: I build production-grade cloud and Kubernetes platforms using AWS-native tools, Terraform, Boto3, and GitOps with ArgoCD. Simplify the Complex: I enjoy distilling tricky DevOps/Kubernetes setups into reusable, production-ready blueprints and documenting them for my teams ‚Äî and now, for you. Tinker & Experiment: Whether it‚Äôs Raspberry Pi projects, AI/ML for logs, or self-hosted apps, I enjoy practical side quests. Share & Help: This blog is my way of giving back to the tech community by writing down things that I wish I had found when I needed them. üß™ What You’ll Find Here How-To Guides: Precise, action-oriented solutions with code Kubernetes + Cloud Automation: Real-world patterns, not Hello Worlds Side Projects: From home automation to predictive ML models Occasional Philosophy: Because sometimes, even DevOps engineers ponder about Shiva üòÑ ‚òï Let‚Äôs Connect If something here helps you, consider sharing the post ‚Äî or drop me a line. I believe in simplifying, automating, and sharing knowledge, and I‚Äôm just getting started.
Thanks for visiting. üôè
